attacks.name: Poison Rub
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pride Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Nidoqueen on your Bench. This attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage for each heads.
